comments: Professor Marttinen didnt have many lectures but he tries to help the students learn to the best of his ability. In the beginning of the semester I didnt like him because I felt that he didnt do anything like a professor should (give lectures, or study guide) but I\'ve come to realize he teaches by doing things with his students. he is a good prof

comments: Yes, Mr. Martinen is good looking however I quickly began dreading this class. Lectures are long, boring, and repetitive. He keeps you to the VERY end and sometimes goes over without a break. He assigns a LOT of busy work. Take with a different professor if you\'re not a KNES major.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Great teacher--reflects on what works well in class and gets us involved with discussion really well. Shared great ideas for teachers to bring into PE. He is kind, funny, and respectful to his students. Although his voice can be a little monotone, he tries really hard...and he\'s easy on the eyes ;)

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: This class was pretty easy. His lectures are boring and kinda irrelevant! Most of time spent learning in the gym playing the games. 2 exams and must create & teach 1 lesson plan. He\'s not real clear on the amount of points in class. Can get by without the book. His study guide is really helpful. Nice guy, that likes to have fun.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: He was a great teacher. He is very cool and respectful. The class was EXTREMELY easy, there were only 2 midterms, 1 paper, 1 group presentation, and the final. Attendance is only mandatory in the 1st week and textbook use is very minimal. If you want an EASY A, TAKE HIM!!!

comments: Seeing him in class was my favorite part of my day. He is a great professor, obviously very smart and really cares about the class,he makes it really fun and interesting, but most importantly, he is just so good looking. Seriously.
